title: the new ryze changes are unacceptable
body:
wtf riot why do you want to murder the only fun mage left? 
if this makes it to live rito HAS to revert irelia's nerfs these are the only two champs i enjoy playing anymore and i can't stand seeing them both in a pathetic unplayable state why don't you fucking nerf yasuo hes much more annoying than these two champs

also mods pls unban me i want to post on my main account not doppelgangers thx
